backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing blog posts with create, fetch, list, search, and slug lookup functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptions summarizing each component or page’s purpose.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background/text settings.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing full crawling and referencing sitemap.xml.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing URLs for home, blog, about, task pages, and sample blog posts with metadata.
frontend/scripts/README-sitemap.md: Instructions for updating sitemap.xml when blog posts change.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for home, blog list, blog post details, about, and task pages.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogPostCar: Blog post preview card showing title, formatted date, excerpt, and link to full post.
frontend/src/components/home/DailyTaskSe: Daily task module opening random links and accepting a secret code submission with success feedback.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero section with background image, multilingual text, and CTA button linking to Facebook profile.
frontend/src/components/home/TimeBucksMe: Displays a promotional card for TimeBucks with earning details, bonus info, and a signup button linking to an external referral URL.
frontend/src/components/home/TimeBucksSt: Renders a step-by-step guide explaining how to sign up, verify, work, and withdraw earnings on TimeBucks.
frontend/src/components/home/TranscribeM: Shows an overview of TranscribeMe transcription jobs with steps, tips, and a CTA linking to the job application page.
frontend/src/components/home/WelcomeSect: Displays a welcome message from the site owner introducing upcoming income site tutorials.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileMen: Implements a mobile slide-in navigation menu with scroll locking, links, and close controls.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Provides footer sections including about info, quick links, help links, social icons, and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Renders the site header with logo, navigation links, a tasks dropdown, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main layout with background layers, header, routed content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/monetization/AdP: Renders a styled placeholder box for different ad slot variants such as banner, sidebar, and in-content.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Ads: Loads an Adsterra script once and renders a container div for the native banner.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Aff: Displays a styled placeholder card for an affiliate product with title, description, and button.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Dynamically updates document title and SEO meta tags including Open Graph and Twitter Card values.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskHowToC: Shows a four‑step instructional list explaining how to complete a task.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskIntera: Provides UI for starting a task, entering a secret code, and showing a temporary success message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlogPosts.ts: Supplies hooks for fetching, retrieving, and searching blog posts with fallback sample data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for login, identity persistence, and auth status handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables, and global styles including neon color themes and background images.
frontend/src/lib/blogSampleFallback.ts: Provides fallback sample blog posts when the backend has no data or is unavailable.
frontend/src/lib/helpLinks.ts: Defines a list of static admin help links with labels and URLs.
frontend/src/lib/siteConfig.ts: Contains site-wide SEO and metadata configuration such as name, description, and default image.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with biography, expertise sections, and contact info using SEO and layout components.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Displays a list of blog posts with loading and error states and includes SEO and ad placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Shows a single blog post with metadata, content, ads, and fallbacks for loading and errors.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero and welcome sections and sets SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/Task1Page.tsx: Presents Task 1 instructions and interaction card with a link back to home.
frontend/src/pages/Task2Page.tsx: Presents Task 2 instructions and interaction card with a link back to home.
frontend/src/pages/Task3Page.tsx: Presents Task 3 instructions and interaction card with a link back to home.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom themes, colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state with homepage design updates, navigation/mobile requirements, and visual/contrast rules, plus notes on known issues and existing features. Provides detailed architectural guidance for layout, styling, and ad embedding behavior.
